mapper.select: SELECT rnr.node_id FROM role_node_r rnr WHERE rnr.role_id = #{ roleId } AND NOT (rnr.role_id IN (SELECT role_id FROM role WHERE state != 1)) AND NOT (rnr.node_id IN (SELECT DISTINCT pid FROM system_node WHERE pid IS NOT NULL)) AND NOT (rnr.node_id IN (SELECT system_node.node_id FROM system_node WHERE state != 1))

SELECT sn.node_id, sn.method, sn.path FROM role_node_r rnr JOIN system_node sn ON rnr.node_id = sn.node_id WHERE rnr.role_id = #{roleId} AND NOT (rnr.node_id IN (SELECT DISTINCT pid FROM system_node WHERE pid IS NOT NULL)) AND NOT (rnr.role_id IN (SELECT role_id FROM role WHERE state != 1)) AND sn.state = 1
